targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id,
  version,
  label,
  node_name,
  created_at
FROM sora_node
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  sora_version,
  sora_label,
  sora_node_name,
  stats_type,
  type_total,
  type_processes,
  type_processes_used,
  type_system,
  type_atom,
  type_atom_used,
  type_binary,
  type_code,
  type_ets
FROM erlang_vm_memory_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_label = '$label' AND
  sora_node_name = '$node_name' AND
  sora_version = '$version'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  type_total
FROM erlang_vm_memory_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_label = '$label' AND
  sora_node_name = '$node_name' AND
  sora_version = '$version'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  type_total - lag(type_total) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "type_total (delta)",
  type_total
FROM erlang_vm_memory_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_label = '$label' AND
  sora_node_name = '$node_name' AND
  sora_version = '$version'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  type_processes
FROM erlang_vm_memory_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_label = '$label' AND
  sora_node_name = '$node_name' AND
  sora_version = '$version'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id,
  channel_id,
  session_id,
  connection_id,
  client_id,
  role,
  version,
  label,
  node_name,
  multistream,
  simulcast,
  spotlight,
  created_at
FROM sora_connection
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  label = '$label' AND
  node_name = '$node_name' AND
  version = '$version'
ORDER BY 1

list.definition: SELECT node_name FROM sora_node WHERE label='$label' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
list.name: node_name
list.query: SELECT node_name FROM sora_node WHERE label='$label' ORDER BY timestamp DESC

list.definition: SELECT version FROM sora_node WHERE label='$label' AND node_name='$node_name' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
list.name: version
list.query: SELECT version FROM sora_node WHERE label='$label' AND node_name='$node_name' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
